description: Next.js 14+ App Router project initialized with TypeScript
steps: Create Next.js project with App Router enabled
Set up path aliases (@/ for root imports)
Verify project runs with npm run dev

description: Vercel AI SDK installed and configured
steps: Verify streaming response works with test endpoint
Add commonly used components (Button, Input, Card, Table, Dialog)

description: File storage configured with S3-compatible service
steps: Configure AWS S3 or Cloudflare R2 credentials
Verify file upload and retrieval works

description: User entity exists in database schema
steps: Include fields: id, email, name, avatarUrl, createdAt, updatedAt
Run migration and verify table created

description: Vault entity exists in database schema
steps: Include fields: id, name, description, type (enum: knowledge_base/sandbox), isShared, maxFiles, createdAt, updatedAt
Run migration and verify table created

description: Document entity exists in database schema
steps: Include fields: id, vaultId, name, documentType, fileType, storageKey, sizeBytes, pageCount, metadata (JSON), embeddingStatus, createdAt, updatedAt
Add foreign key relation to Vault with cascade delete
Add indexes on vaultId, documentType, embeddingStatus
Run migration and verify table created

description: Workflow entity exists in database schema
steps: Include fields: id, name, description, category, outputType, stepCount, columnSchema (JSON), promptTemplate, isSystem, isActive, createdAt, updatedAt
Add index on category and isSystem
Run migration and verify table created

description: WorkflowStep entity exists in database schema
steps: Include fields: id, workflowId, order, name, action, config (JSON)
Add foreign key relation to Workflow with cascade delete
Run migration and verify table created

description: Prompt entity exists in database schema
steps: Include fields: id, userId, name, content, ownerType, category, isActive, createdAt, updatedAt
Add optional foreign key to User
Run migration and verify table created

description: Example entity exists in database schema
steps: Include fields: id, name, promptText, documentRef, response, ownerType, createdAt
Run migration and verify table created

description: AssistantQuery entity exists in database schema
steps: Include fields: id, userId, conversationId, inputText, outputText, outputType, deepAnalysis, tokenCount, latencyMs, status, createdAt
Add indexes on conversationId and createdAt
Run migration and verify table created

description: SourceReference entity exists in database schema
steps: Include fields: id, queryId, sourceType, sourceId, sourceName
Add foreign key to AssistantQuery with cascade delete
Run migration and verify table created

description: HistoryEntry entity exists in database schema
steps: Include fields: id, userId, queryId, title, type, sourcesSummary, createdAt
Add foreign key to User and AssistantQuery
Run migration and verify table created

description: StarredItem entity exists in database schema
steps: Include fields: id, userId, itemType, itemId, createdAt
Add unique constraint on [userId, itemType, itemId]
Run migration and verify table created
Add General category workflows: Draft Client Alert, Draft from Template, Extract Timeline, Proofread, Summarize Calls, Transcribe Audio, Translate
Add Transactional category workflows: Analyze Change of Control, Draft Covenants Memo, Draft Item 1.01, Extract Key Data, Extract Terms from Agreements
Set isSystem=true for all seed workflows
Run seed and verify workflows exist in database
Sidebar contains navigation items: Assistant, Vault, Workflows, History, Library
Each nav item has an icon and label
Active nav item is visually highlighted
Sidebar is fixed on left side of screen

description: Sidebar has Create button at top
steps: Add prominent Create button above navigation items
Button opens dropdown or modal with create options
Create options include: New Vault, New Query

description: Sidebar has Settings and Help links at bottom
steps: Add Settings link at bottom of sidebar
Both links navigate to respective pages

description: Application header shows current page title
steps: Header is sticky at top of content area

description: Assistant page displays centered chat interface
steps: Verify text input area below title
Verify input placeholder says 'Ask anything. Type @ to add sources.'
Verify Ask button to submit query

description: Assistant has output type toggle buttons
Assistant has source selector buttons below input
steps: Verify 'Choose vault' button to select vault sources
Verify vault buttons appear for each available vault
Clicking vault button adds it as a source
Selected sources show visual indicator (checkmark or highlight)

description: Assistant has Files and sources button
steps: Verify 'Files and sources' button below input
Clicking opens panel to attach files directly
Can drag and drop files to attach
Selecting prompt inserts it into input
Verify 'Deep analysis' checkbox or toggle exists
Verify 'Recommended workflows' section at bottom of page
Each card shows workflow name, description, output type
Clicking card navigates to workflow execution

description: Assistant streams AI responses in real-time
steps: Enter a query in Assistant input
Verify response streams in progressively (not all at once)
Verify streaming indicator shows during generation
Verify response completes and indicator stops

description: Assistant uses selected vaults as context
steps: Select one or more vaults as sources
Enter query related to vault contents
Verify AI response references information from selected vault documents
Verify new entry appears with query title, type, and timestamp
Submit follow-up query referencing previous response
Verify AI maintains context from previous turn
Send POST request with inputText, sources, outputType
Verify streaming response with proper headers
Verify Vercel AI SDK streamText is used
Verify query record created in database with status tracking

description: Vault page shows list of vaults in grid layout
steps: Verify existing vaults display as cards in grid
Each card shows vault name, type label, file count

description: Vault cards show visual distinction by type
steps: Verify Knowledge Base vaults have distinct icon/style
Verify Sandbox vaults have different icon/style or label
Verify 'Shared' label appears for shared vaults

description: New vault card allows vault creation
steps: Verify modal/dialog opens for vault creation
Form includes: name field, description field, type selector
Displays max file limit info (100,000 files)
Submit creates vault and refreshes list

description: Vault list has sort and view options
steps: Verify 'Sort by' dropdown exists (Recently viewed, Name, Date created)
Verify search box to filter vaults

description: Vault detail page shows files table
steps: Verify page header shows vault name and file count
Verify files displayed in sortable table
Table columns: Name, Document type, Updated, File type, Size

description: Vault detail shows quick query box
steps: Verify small query input box in top right area
Submitting navigates to Assistant with vault pre-selected
Verify file appears in table after upload completes

description: Document type can be set on files
steps: Verify document type column shows classification
Document type displayed as colored badge/tag
Click to edit document type (dropdown or inline edit)
Verify vault and associated documents removed

description: Document upload stores file in S3
steps: Verify file uploaded to S3 with unique storageKey
Verify Document record created with correct metadata
Verify file can be downloaded via presigned URL
Verify embeddingStatus updates to 'completed' on success
Verify response includes array of vaults
Each vault includes id, name, type, fileCount
Send POST request with name, description, type
Verify response includes array of documents
Send multipart POST request with file
Send POST request with filename and contentType
Verify URL allows direct upload to S3
Verify URL expires after configured time

description: Workflows page shows categorized workflow cards
steps: Verify workflows grouped by category (General, Transactional)
Workflows displayed as cards in grid within category
Verify each card shows workflow name
Verify card shows output type indicator (Draft, Review table, Output)
Verify card shows step count or column count as applicable
Verify 'Output' dropdown filter (Draft, Review table, etc.)
Verify search box to find workflows
Page shows workflow name, description, steps
File upload or selection area displayed
Verify documents processed according to workflow steps
Verify output is formatted document text
Verify output can be copied or downloaded

description: Review table workflow outputs structured table
steps: Execute a Review table type workflow
Verify output is structured table with defined columns
Verify data extracted into appropriate columns
Verify table can be exported (CSV, etc.)
Verify response includes array of workflows
Supports filtering by category and outputType
Includes both system and custom workflows
Send POST request with documentIds and parameters
Verify streaming response for real-time output

description: History page shows query history table
steps: Verify table with columns: Created, Title, Type, Source
Verify rows sorted by date descending (newest first)

description: History page has search and filter controls
steps: Verify search box to search history
Verify date range filter (Past month, etc.)

description: History entries can be expanded for detail
steps: Verify query detail expands or modal opens
Shows full input text and output response

description: History shows empty state when no results
steps: Filter to date range with no history
Verify response includes array of history entries
Supports search, dateFrom, dateTo, type, groupBy params
Supports pagination with page and limit

description: Library page has Prompts and Examples sections

steps: Empty state shows 'Your starred items will appear here'
Verify prompt list page or modal opens
Shows system prompts and personal prompts
Each prompt shows name and preview of content
Each example shows name, prompt preview, response preview
Can click to view full example
Click star to add to starred
Verify item appears in Starred section
Verify item removed from Starred section
Verify prompt appears in personal prompts list
Verify response includes system and personal prompts
Supports filtering by ownerType and category
Send POST request with name, content
Send POST request with itemType and itemId
Send DELETE request with itemType and itemId
Verify user profile section (name, email, avatar)
Can set default deep analysis preference
Measure time to first streamed token
Navigate to each main page (Assistant, Vault, Workflows, History, Library)
Verify all pages load within 1 second

description: File upload handles 10MB files within 5 seconds

steps: Verify error message displayed to user
Attempt to upload unsupported file type
Attempt to upload file exceeding size limit
